description: This file defines the React component 'NoteView' responsible for rendering a note's details, including title, tags, content, and metadata, with functionalities for editing and deleting a note.

methods.name: NoteView({ note, onEdit, onDelete, accent, primary, secondary })
methods.description: React functional component for displaying a note with edit and delete actions, tags, content, and last updated timestamp.

methods.name: formatFullDate(timestamp)
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a human-readable date string.

ctags.name: NoteView
ctags.pattern: /^function NoteView({ note, onEdit, onDelete, accent, primary, secondary }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ note, onEdit, onDelete, accent, primary, secondary })
